channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- 2nd Gen AMD EPYC™
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- 2nd Gen AMD EPYC™

item.title: CVE-2021-26338|2024-09-17T01:56:07.563Z -- amd -- 2nd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Improper access controls in System Management Unit (SMU) may allow for an attacker to override performance control tables located in DRAM resulting in a potential lack of system resources.

item.title: CVE-2020-12961|2024-09-17T04:13:59.255Z -- amd -- 2nd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: A potential vulnerability exists in AMD Platform Security Processor (PSP) that may allow an attacker to zero any privileged register on the System Management Network which may lead to bypassing SPI ROM protections.
